article.title: Cro-hook
article.paragraph: Thecro-hook, is a special double-endedcrochet hookused to make double-sidedcrochet. It employs the use of a long double-ended hook, which permits the maker to work stitches on or off from either end.cite bookBrittainSusanMantheyKarenCrocheting For Dummieshttp://books.google.com/books?id8 March 2011John Wiley & Sons978-1-118-05334-821Because the hook has two ends, two alternating colors of thread can be used simultaneously and freely interchanged, working loops over the hook.cite bookMilneStephanie J.Handmade Style Crochethttp://books.google.com/books?id2011Allen & Unwin978-1-74266-598-610Crafts using a double-ended hook are commercially marketed as Cro-hook and Crochenit. Cro-hook is a variation ofTunisian crochetand also shows similarities with the Afghan stitch used to make Afghan scarves, but the fabric is typically softer with greater elasticity.cite bookSimsDarlaCrocheting for Fun and Profithttp://books.google.com/books?id2000Prima Pub.978-0-7615-2161-718
